programme.title: Episode 102
programme.desc: Ashley discovers more about Dylan's alternative sex life while searching for the elusive Nolan Keats. The girls' book club leads to some controversial and erotic stories. Meanwhile, Raif and Ashley take their friendship to a dangerous place as Dylan nabs a beautiful newcomer for the bondage cellar - but for what? And for whom?(n)

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: When Las Vegas cop Vincent Downs (Jamie Foxx) and his partner Sean (Tip "T.I." Harris) rob a cocaine shipment bound for a drug-dealing casino boss (Dermot Mulroney), the desperate businessman retaliates by kidnapping Vincent's son (Octavius J. Johnson). Pursued by a dogged Internal Affairs investigator (Michelle Monaghan) and a sadistic drug kingpin (Scoot McNairy), Vincent must rely on his street smarts and sheer force of will as he tries to rescue his child over the course of a single night. Directed by Baran bo Odar.(n)

programme.title: You, Me and Him
programme.desc: Two female lovers, one a career driven lawyer (Lucy Punch), the other a fun-loving, pot-smoking layabout (Faye Marsay), have an annoying Casanova neighbor (David Tennant). While neither woman ever wanted children, both end up pregnant, creating conflicts that cause each to re-examine their outlook on life and their relationship.(n)

programme.title: Away From Her
programme.desc: A lovingly devoted couple feel their unshakable longtime bond begin to unravel thanks to the ravages of Alzheimer's Disease in this remarkable tour-de-force of acting and powerfully emotional writing from first-time director Sarah Polley. Gordon Pinsent, Julie Christie and Olympia Dukakis star.(n)

programme.title: Autumn In New York
programme.desc: A wealthy, charismatic New York restaurateur (Richard Gere) falls for a much younger hat designer (Winona Ryder) but their relationship is complicated by his philandering ways, his past connection to her family, and her debilitating illness. Jill Hennessey, Anthony LaPaglia, Sherry Stringfield and Elaine Stritch costar in this romantic melodrama.(n)

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it.(n)

programme.title: A Woman, A Part
programme.desc: Maggie Siff stars as Anna Baskin, an exhausted workaholic actress at a crossroads. She abruptly extricates herself from a successful but mind-numbing TV role, returning to a life she left behind with ex-creative partners Kate (Cara Seymour) and Isaac (John Ortiz). Director Elisabeth Subrin examines the media's portrayal of women, the nature of friendship and the difficulties of reckoning with change.(n)

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas.(n)

programme.title: Mercy (2010)
programme.desc: A writer (Scott Caan) of highly sentimental love stories is secretly a womanizing cynic who has never actually experienced love, until he meets the beautiful and shockingly straightforward critic Mercy (Wendy Glenn), who is not fooled by his phony mawkishness. Erika Christensen costars in this romantic drama.(n)

programme.title: The Rendezvous
programme.desc: Rachel, a Jewish-American doctor and Jake, an Arab-American government bureaucrat, are trying to solve the mysterious death of Rachel's brother. Racing around the world, they find themselves hunted by a doomsday group. The group believes Rachel and Jake possess an ancient script discovered by Rachel's brother that could bring about the end of days. Caught in the middle of a plot to hasten the end of mankind, Rachel and Jake must solve a murder and save the world.(n)

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.(n)

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.(n)

programme.title: Let's Make Love
programme.desc: A billionaire uses a fake name to feign being an actor in order to get into a Broadway show satirizing him, but he winds up falling for the beautiful woman playing opposite him. (cc).

programme.title: Some Like It Hot
programme.desc: Two male musicians go on the lam posing as women in an all-girl orchestra after witnessing a gangland massacre in 1929 Chicago. (cc).

programme.title: It
programme.desc: Clara Bow scored a sensation in this Jazz Age silent about a salesgirl out to land her wealthy employer (Antonio Moreno). Monty: William Austin. Adela: Jacqueline Gadsdon. Mrs. Van Norman: Julia Swayne Gordon. Molly: Priscilla Bonner. Directed by Clarence Badger.

programme.title: The Movies
programme.desc: A country boy (Lloyd Hamilton) heads to the big city, where he butts heads with an ill-tempered man and winds up landing a job as a motion-picture star's stand-in, which he discovers is not all fame and glory. Written and directed by Roscoe "Fatty" Arbuckle.

programme.title: Cruel Gun Story
programme.desc: An ex-con mulls robbing an armored car to help his disabled sister.

programme.title: Thrills of Yesterday
programme.desc: Clips from silent films include Harry Houdini performing a magic trick involving keys.

programme.title: A Colt is My Passport
programme.desc: A crafty hitman and his cunning sidekick attempt a daring escape after carrying out a high-profile contract and incurring the wrath of a vicious gang.

programme.title: MGM Parade
programme.desc: George Murphy introduces clips from "The Great Ziegfeld," with Ray Bolger, and "The Tender Trap," with Debbie Reynolds.

programme.title: 20 Mule Team
programme.desc: Wallace Beery as a tough old mule skinner driving his wagon train through Death Valley at the turn of the century. Marjorie Rambeau. Pete: Leo Carrillo. Jean: Anne Baxter. Mitch: Noah Beery Jr. Roper: Douglas Fowley. Jackass: Berton Churchill. Salters: Arthur Hohl. Good action yarn. Anne Baxter's first film.

programme.title: Angel on My Shoulder
programme.desc: The devil agrees to release a recently murdered gangster back to Earth if he'll take over the body of an honest judge and make him do bad deeds. The criminal, eager to settle the score with his killer, finds out being bad isn't so easy in his new guise. (cc).

programme.title: Have You Ever Wondered?
programme.desc: Entry in the “Pete Smith Specialty” series seeks to answer a number of questions about whimsical topics. Narrated by Pete Smith.

programme.title: Bedevilled
programme.desc: A divinity student (Steve Forrest) shelters a fugitive (Anne Baxter) in this suspense tale. Directed by Mitchell Leisen. Filmed in Paris. (cc).

programme.title: Chase a Crooked Shadow
programme.desc: An heiress is tormented by a stranger who claims to be the brother she thought dead. Richard Todd, Anne Baxter, Herbert Lom, Alexander Knox, Faith Brook. Directed by Michael Anderson. (cc).

programme.title: The Blue Gardenia
programme.desc: A reporter sets out to prove a telephone operator did not commit murder after she spends a drunken evening with a womanizer only to learn he was found dead the next morning. Nat King Cole sings the film's theme. (cc).

programme.title: Cimarron
programme.desc: Frontier epic based on Edna Ferber's best seller covers the years 1890 to 1915 and chronicles how an impulsive and short-fused cowboy and his savvy immigrant wife were instrumental in the settling of the Oklahoma territory. (cc).

programme.title: I Confess
programme.desc: Alfred Hitchcock's drama about a priest falsely accused of murder and brought to trial, where the only way to prove his innocence is to violate the sanctity of the confessional. (cc).

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: Orson Welles' follow-up to "Citizen Kane" is this Best Picture nominee, an epic tale of the gradual decline of an old-monied Indianapolis family in the face of turn-of-the-century industrialization. The Ambersons' magnificent lives are apparent as the film opens, as is their sense of propriety. Welles, who directed, produced and adapted the screenplay from Booth Tarkington's novel, also provides the narration. Remade as a 2002 made-for-cable film. (cc).

programme.title: The Winslow Boy
programme.desc: An attorney takes the case of a young teen expelled from naval college for stealing to England's highest court. The family of the accused suffers humiliation as the public sides with the establishment. (cc).

programme.title: The Inn of the Sixth Happiness
programme.desc: An account of British evangelical Christian Gladys Aylward's missionary work in pre-WWII China. (cc).

programme.title: Sabotage Agent
programme.desc: A British spy sabotages the Nazi war effort in Czechoslovakia after being hired as a chemist at a poison gas factory. He must then figure out how to sneak quietly back out of the country.

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: Retelling of the Dumas classic about a wrongfully accused man who escapes after spending years in prison, recovers a buried treasure and assumes a royal identity as he wreaks a calculated vengeance upon the scoundrels who betrayed him and had him put away. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Vacation from Marriage
programme.desc: Gentle story of how the war changes a stuffy married couple when they join the service. Robert Donat and Deborah Kerr are excellent. Dizzy: Glynis Johns. Elena: Ann Todd. Richard: Roland Culver. Alexander Korda directed. (cc).

programme.title: The Viking
programme.desc: Silent epic about explorer Leif Eriksson and his voyage from Norway to the east coast of North America, complete with a raid on England and a mutiny fomented by the first mate.

programme.title: Nanook of the North
programme.desc: Robert Flaherty's famous account of an Eskimo family and their struggle for survival. Narrated by Berry Kroeger (added to the silent classic in 1949).

programme.title: Snow Devils
programme.desc: Mixture of interplanetary adventure and Abominable Snowman thriller. Jack Stuart (Giacomo Rossi Stuart), Amber Collins (Ombretta Colli), Peter Martell, Renato Baldini, Halina Zalewska. A.k.a. "Snow Demons." (cc).

programme.title: Letter From Siberia
programme.desc: Through a letter, life in Siberia is explored. (cc).

programme.title: U.S. Army Air Force Band
programme.desc: The U.S. Army Air Force Band performs patriotic songs, including "The Army Air Corps Song (Off We Go Into the Wild Blue Yonder)" and "Shout! Wherever You May Be, I Am an American." Directed by Jean Negulesco.

programme.title: The Secret Land
programme.desc: Adm. Byrd's 1947 expedition to Antarctica. Narrated by Robert Montgomery, Robert Taylor, Van Heflin. Camera work is superb and often breathtakingly beautiful. Orville O. Dull produced. (cc).

programme.title: With Byrd at the South Pole
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning account of Rear Admiral Richard E. Byrd's 1929 expedition to the South Pole. The Academy Award went to Joseph T. Rucker and Willard Van der Veer's cinematography. Clair D. Alexander.

programme.title: Arctic Fury
programme.desc: Factual story about a downed doctor-flier's efforts to reach a plague-stricken village. Del Cambre, Fred Smith, Eve Miller, Gloria Petrov. Interestingly filmed on location. (cc).

programme.title: White Peril
programme.desc: A profile of ski-patrol members working the Cascade Mountains in Washington state. Narrated by Peter Roberts.

programme.title: Petticoat Fever
programme.desc: A lonely Labrador wireless operator detains a couple after they are forced to make an emergency landing, and a love triangle ensues. (cc).

programme.title: The Thing From Another World
programme.desc: A team of scientists at an Arctic research station near the crash site of a UFO unearth a mysterious figure frozen in ice, and when it thaws the unearthly monster goes on a murderous rampage. Remade by John Carpenter in 1982. (cc).

programme.title: Tarzan, the Ape Man
programme.desc: Johnny Weissmuller's first outing as Edgar Rice Burroughs' African-jungle hero has him aiding a young Englishwoman and her fortune-hunting father. This was the first sound version of the Tarzan adventures. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Tarzan and His Mate
programme.desc: Tarzan (Johnny Weissmuller) defeats a romantic rival (Neil Hamilton) and foils the villains in his most entertaining jungle epic. Maureen O'Sullivan. Arlington: Paul Cavanagh. Saidi: Nathan Curry. Beamish: Forrester Harvey. Packed with action and thrills; wonderful animal scenes. Jack Conway, Cedric Gibbons directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Tarzan Escapes
programme.desc: Tarzan is taken prisoner by a hunter who wants to put him on exhibit. Johnny Weissmuller, Maureen O'Sullivan. Richard Thorpe directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Tarzan Finds a Son!
programme.desc: Tarzan (Johnny Weissmuller) and Jane (Maureen O'Sullivan) vs. inheritance hunters (Ian Hunter, Frieda Inescort) out to snatch Boy (John Sheffield). Mrs. Richard Lansing: Laraine Day. Sir Thomas: Henry Stephenson. Richard Thorpe directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Tarzan's Secret Treasure
programme.desc: The jungle lord's domain is invaded by explorers who attempt to appropriate his gold deposits. Johnny Weissmuller, Maureen O'Sullivan, Reginald Owen, Barry Fitzgerald, Johnny Sheffield, Tom Conway, Philip Dorn. Richard Thorpe directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Tarzan's New York Adventure
programme.desc: Boy is snatched by a circus man, and Tarzan is off to rescue him in the Big Apple. (cc).(n)

programme.desc: Tarzan (Johnny Weissmuller) tangles with carnivorous plants, Nazis and a jumbo spider in this entry. Nancy Kelly, Johnny Sheffield, Otto Kruger. Selim: Robert Lowery. Karl: Joe Sawyer. William Thiele directed. (cc).(n)

programme.desc: Tarzan (Johnny Weissmuller) aids a native girl (Linda Christian) who is an unwilling bride-to-be of a feared island "god." Brenda Joyce, George Zucco. Varga: Fernando Wagner. Benji: John Laurenz. Score by Dimitri Tiomkin. Robert Florey directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Tarzan's Magic Fountain
programme.desc: The ape man (Lex Barker) discovers a jungle where inhabitants enjoy eternal youth. Jane: Brenda Joyce. Trask: Albert Dekker. Gloria: Evelyn Ankers. Jessup: Alan Napier. Dodd: Charles Drake. Pasco: Ted Hecht. Barker's first film as Tarzan. Lee Sholem directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Tarzan and the Slave Girl
programme.desc: The ape man organizes a safari to rescue native girls held by fugitive tribesmen. Lex Barker, Vanessa Brown, Robert Alda, Denise Darcel. Prince: Hurd Hatfield. Lee Sholem directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Believe It or Not
programme.desc: A look at unusual places and things in northern Africa.(n)

programme.title: Tarzan's Peril
programme.desc: The jungle man cracks down on gunrunners. Lex Barker, Virginia Huston, George Macready, Douglas Fowley. Andrews: Glenn Anders. Peters: Alan Napier. Byron Haskin directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Tarzan's Savage Fury
programme.desc: Crooks hoodwink Tarzan (Lex Barker) into leading them in search of diamonds. Jane: Dorothy Hart. Rokov: Charles Korvin. Joey: Tommy Carlton. Cy Endfield directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Tarzan and the She-Devil
programme.desc: The ape man (Lex Barker) and wife Jane (Joyce MacKenzie) are menaced by ivory hunters. Raymond Burr, Monique Von Vooren. Fidel: Tom Conway. Familiar jungle thriller. Kurt Neumann directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Tarzan's Hidden Jungle

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: This biopic of celebrated physicist Stephen Hawking explores his early years at Cambridge, where he fell in love with liberal-arts student and future wife Jane shortly before being diagnosed with ALS. As the years progress, Jane begins to feel more like a nurse than a spouse, and Hawking develops feelings for a woman who is hired to care for him. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Room 104
programme.desc: The present meets the past when a housekeeper reconnects with her younger self. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Wish I Was Here
programme.desc: A 35-year-old father who's never quite grown up learns about life when he's forced to homeschool his kids, since their grandfather can no longer afford their private-school tuition and their public school is a mess. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: All the Real Girls
programme.desc: A small-town lothario (Paul Schneider) tries to change his ways when he falls in love with his best friend's 18-year-old sister (Zooey Deschanel). Slow paced, but well-acted. Patricia Clarkson. Directed by David Gordon Green. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Garden State
programme.desc: A twentysomething slacker (writer-director Zach Braff) faces his estranged family when he returns to New Jersey for his mother's funeral. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: A free-spirited woman convinces her anxious mother to join her on a vacation to South America she'd been planning with her beau before they broke up. However, their trip turns into a wild adventure when they escape from an attempted kidnapping. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Miles and Jack take a trip to California's wine country the week before Jack gets married. While Miles wants to turn Jack on to the art of wine tasting, Jack longs to exploit his last days as a bachelor when they encounter two fascinating women. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: This biopic of celebrated physicist Stephen Hawking explores his early years at Cambridge, where he fell in love with liberal-arts student and future wife Jane shortly before being diagnosed with ALS. As the years progress, Jane begins to feel more like a nurse than a spouse, and Hawking develops feelings for a woman who is hired to care for him. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Garden State
programme.desc: A twentysomething slacker (writer-director Zach Braff) faces his estranged family when he returns to New Jersey for his mother's funeral. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Kong Skull Island
programme.desc: A disillusioned soldier and a photojournalist join an expedition to Skull Island, an uncharted territory in the Pacific. There, the group get caught up in an ongoing war between a gigantic ape called King Kong and the area's indigenous predators. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Alien 3
programme.desc: Crash landing on a barren penal-colony planet with an unwelcome visitor in tow, Ripley contends with a group of hardened convicts while using nothing but her wits to battle a terrifying new breed of alien. Although her plan to corner and kill the creature just might work, a horrifying discovery reveals that her fight is far from over. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Rock Star
programme.desc: A singer (Mark Wahlberg) in a heavy-metal tribute band joins the real group and gets swept up in the world of sex, drugs, and rock and roll. Emily: Jennifer Aniston. Mats: Timothy Spall. Kirk: Dominic West. A.C.: Jason Bonham. Rob: Timothy Olyphant. Directed by Stephen Herek. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Flipped
programme.desc: Mischievous schoolboy Bryce realizes that the girl he has struggled to avoid may be his one true love. Over the course of six years, Juli pines for Bryce, who does everything in his power to put her off. Later, as the pair enter junior high, Bryce discovers girls and realizes his true feelings for Juli. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Mom and Dad Save the World
programme.desc: An alien emperor, intending to destroy Earth, abducts a suburban housewife. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Girl
programme.desc: A fictionalized account of director Alfred Hitchcock's obsession with model Tippi Hedren, whom he plucked from relative obscurity to star in his 1963 thriller "The Birds"; and how what began as a promising professional relationship turned sour when he became obsessed with his leading lady. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: HBO First Look 'Gifted'
programme.desc: A look at "Gifted," a 2017 drama about a man doing his best to raise his 7-year-old niece, whose emergence as a math prodigy leads to a custody battle between the man and his mother. The film stars Chris Evans, Mckenna Grace and Lindsay Duncan, and is directed Marc Webb. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Seabiscuit
programme.desc: A depression-era sports drama about the legendary racehorse, Seabiscuit, and the three men who saw him to victory. Together, the three work to help the famed horse to several symbolic victories that helped to inspire a downtrodden 1930s America. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Hours
programme.desc: Three women, separated by 80 years, struggle with similar crises linked by the novel Mrs. Dalloway. Author Virginia Woolf attempts to start writing that novel, a '50s housewife contemplates leaving her life behind and a modern-day book editor cares for a former boyfriend who's fighting AIDS. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Proof
programme.desc: Gwyneth Paltrow and Hope Davis are superb as the daughters of a mentally unstable math genius (Anthony Hopkins) in this intelligent adaptation of David Auburn's Pulitzer Prize-winning play. Jake Gyllenhaal. Directed by John Madden (“Shakespeare in Love”). (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: The lives of a working-class American, a French journalist and a London schoolboy intersect when their collective grief leads them on a journey to discover the truth about the afterlife. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art-gallery owner reads a novel written by her ex-husband, and becomes greatly disturbed by the possibility that the story was inspired by their marriage and that her safety is in jeopardy. (cc).

programme.title: The Beach
programme.desc: An American vacationer and a French couple find danger on a secluded island paradise off the coast of Thailand. (cc).

programme.title: Extreme Ops
programme.desc: Extreme-sports enthusiasts run afoul of a slippery terrorist and his henchmen while filming a commercial in the Austrian Alps. Slick action, absurd plot. Devon Sawa, Rufus Sewell, Bridgette Wilson-Sampras. (cc).

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: Julian is a stylish and successful male prostitute whose life goes downhill when he's framed for murder after doing a pimp a favor. The only person he can trust is a politician's wife who is frustrated with her husband, and is the only woman he sleeps with who doesn't pay for his services. (cc).

programme.title: A Cure for Wellness
programme.desc: A young executive travels to a spa in the Swiss Alps to find and bring home his company's CEO. But when he digs into the truth behind the resort's "miracle cures," the staff diagnose him with the same affliction that has trapped the other guests there. (cc).

programme.title: The English Patient
programme.desc: Nine Oscars, including Best Picture, went to this epic drama about an injured World War II cartographer who reveals his tempestuous affair with a colleague's wife to his caring nurse. (cc).

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: A New York adman deals with the pain of losing a child by writing letters to Time, Death and Love. He is soon visited by representations of the three concepts, and they, along with his close friends, help him return to some semblance of a normal life. (cc).

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
programme.desc: Kids provide for themselves during summer vacation after their babysitter dies. (cc).

programme.title: CHIPS
programme.desc: A maverick motorbike racer reeling from a divorce and a California Highway Patrol cop who's secretly an FBI operative must overcome their personality mismatch and work together to uncover a major theft in this big-screen adaptation of the famous TV series from the 1970s and '80s. (cc).

programme.title: My Little Eye
programme.desc: In this British thriller, five contestants on a reality show spend six months together in an isolated house. They begin to turn on each other after the arrival of a stranger and a gun loaded with five bullets. (cc).

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes puts his strength and intellect to the test as he teams with Watson to battle Lord Blackwood, a formidable new adversary who is determined to destroy England. (cc).

programme.title: Invictus
programme.desc: President Nelson Mandela inspires the South African rugby team to strive for the World Cup in hopes of soothing the country's racial tensions. As rugby captain Francois Pienaar leads his team on a winning streak, the people of South Africa are brought together by their collective desire for a major sports victory. (cc).

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: A clan's estranged patriarch loses his home and learns that his ex-wife plans to remarry, so he pretends to be dying to win back his family. Although his ex lets him move back in, his three adult children don't react well to their father's return. (cc).

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Two hard-partying ladies see a viral video in which unruly brothers plead for dates for their sister's wedding in Hawaii, and decide to pose as the angels they're looking for in order to score a free trip. (cc).

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: Two young boys execute the "perfect" murder, even pinning it on a local crook, but a detective with a disturbed past will not be outsmarted. The boys lie about knowing each other and cover their tracks, but a lack of trust could bring them down. (cc).

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: A scientist discovers a catastrophic problem with Earth's core, and he and a team of experts embark on a dangerous mission to the middle of the planet in the hopes of averting a global disaster. (cc).

programme.title: Mo' Better Blues
programme.desc: This ode to jazz focuses on Bleek Gilliam, a self-absorbed, contemporary trumpet player whose blind devotion to his own talent causes rifts in his professional and personal lives. (cc).

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: A genetically mutated scientist's alter ego runs amok in this adaptation of the Marvel comic. (cc).

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: Set in the year 2018, John Connor leads the human resistance against the computer network Skynet as the machines grow more aggressive than ever before. John was raised to believe in a specific version of the future, but that future begins to shift with the appearance of mysterious former death-row inmate Marcus Wright. As John and Marcus venture into the mechanical heart of Skynet's operations, they make a terrifying discovery about the potential fate of the human race. (cc).

programme.title: The Truth About Charlie
programme.desc: A loose remake of the 1963 film "Charade," this romantic thriller focuses on a mysterious American who aids a Parisian who is menaced by crooks after her husband is killed. (cc).

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A math genius works as a financial consultant for criminal organizations. While being investigated by the Treasury Department, he agrees to help an accounting clerk look into fraud at her company, but the assignment will prove far more dangerous than he could have ever anticipated. (cc).

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A team of incarcerated supervillains, including Deadshot, Harley Quinn, Enchantress, El Diablo and Killer Croc, are recruited by the government for a dangerous mission in exchange for reduced sentences. (cc).

programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: A bomber has rigged a bus with a bomb and a cop must get on-board while it is traveling to figure out how to get the passengers off. (cc).

programme.title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
programme.desc: A struggling actor and crook moves to Los Angeles, hoping to score some movie roles, where he meets a gay PI at a party. When a series of female bodies turn up, they find themselves investigating the murders. (cc).

programme.title: Never Been Kissed
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore enchants as a Chicago newspaper editor who relives her hellish teen years while on an undercover assignment at a local high school. Barrymore's great, but the film celebrates the fact that her character wins over the same type of “in crowd” that taunted her as a teen. David Arquette costars as her cool brother. Raja Gosnell is the director, and Barrymore served as executive producer. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Orange County
programme.desc: With the help of his stoner brother, a California scholar seeks an alternate route to Stanford when the usual college-admissions process doesn't work. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: A single woman and a spy race to elude a federal agent and uncover the truth about a clandestine mission gone awry. Meanwhile, a CIA director attempts to discover why the unlikely duo have taken flight. Extended edition. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: Set in the year 2018, John Connor leads the human resistance against the computer network Skynet as the machines grow more aggressive than ever before. John was raised to believe in a specific version of the future, but that future begins to shift with the appearance of mysterious former death-row inmate Marcus Wright. As John and Marcus venture into the mechanical heart of Skynet's operations, they make a terrifying discovery about the potential fate of the human race. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Romeo Must Die
programme.desc: Violent take on “Romeo and Juliet” centering on the love affair between a Chinese escaped prisoner (Jet Li) and the daughter of the head of a black crime syndicate. The action packs a punch, but the script is packed with clichés. Pop star Aaliyah (1979-2001) costars and performs four songs on the soundtrack. Isaiah Washington. Andrzej Bartkowiak directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Fletch
programme.desc: Investigative reporter Fletch assumes a variety of identities while pursuing a scoop, and is later approached by a rich aviation executive who claims to be dying and wants Fletch to kill him so his wife can collect the insurance. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Extreme Ops
programme.desc: Extreme-sports enthusiasts run afoul of a slippery terrorist and his henchmen while filming a commercial in the Austrian Alps. Slick action, absurd plot. Devon Sawa, Rufus Sewell, Bridgette Wilson-Sampras. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: A grizzled older cop is removed from a car theft case and partnered with a younger detective, but that doesn't stop him from interfering with the investigation, leaving his new partner stuck in between doing what's right and doing his job. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Invictus
programme.desc: President Nelson Mandela inspires the South African rugby team to strive for the World Cup in hopes of soothing the country's racial tensions. As rugby captain Francois Pienaar leads his team on a winning streak, the people of South Africa are brought together by their collective desire for a major sports victory. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Personal Best
programme.desc: Two female track athletes find themselves moving from rivals to lovers as they train for the 1980 Olympics. However, their romance encounter barriers, from one runner's preconceived ideas of her own sexuality to their coach's archaic mindset. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Tin Cup
programme.desc: Comedy about a talented but aimless golf instructor (Kevin Costner) who enters the U.S. Open in a drive to win the heart of a student (Rene Russo). Romeo: Cheech Marin. Simms: Don Johnson. Co-written and directed by Ron Shelton. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore makes her directorial debut with this quirky sports drama about an ex-beauty queen (Ellen Page) who gives up her tiara for roller derby, to the dismay of her mother (Marcia Gay Harden). Kristen Wiig, Juliette Lewis. (cc).(n)

programme.title: A Perfect World
programme.desc: A Texas lawman pursues an escaped convict who has kidnapped a young boy. Meanwhile, in their dash to the border, the convict and the boy form a father-son attachment. (cc).

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art-gallery owner reads a novel written by her ex-husband, and becomes greatly disturbed by the possibility that the story was inspired by their marriage and that her safety is in jeopardy. (cc).

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Joneses
programme.desc: An ordinary suburban couple discover that their hospitable new neighbors are actually government spies. Soon, all four of them are caught up in an international espionage imbroglio. (cc).

programme.title: Neighbors 2 Sorority Rising
programme.desc: Young parents Mac and Kelly find that their neighbor troubles are far from over when a hedonistic sorority moves in next door just as they're about to sell their house. During their feud with the ladies, the couple team up with ex-fratboy Teddy, who tormented them the last time around. (cc).

programme.title: Kung Pow Enter the Fist
programme.desc: A boy is identified as the Chosen One by his unique sentient tongue, and a criminal overlord tries to kill him and his family. The boy survives and perfects his martial-arts skills under the tutelage of a flatulent master before he can avenge his family. Director Steve Oedekerk redubbed and digitally altered footage from the 1977 film "Savage Killers." (cc).

programme.title: Cooties
programme.desc: An outbreak of cooties turns the students at an elementary school into flesh-eating zombies, trapping the faculty inside the building and forcing them to fight for their survival. (cc).

programme.title: Vampires Suck
programme.desc: In this irreverent parody of the "Twilight" series, smitten teen Becca is courted by two fierce rivals as the prom draws near, while her friends struggle to find dates to the dance. (cc).

programme.title: A Monster Calls
programme.desc: A young boy befriends a wise tree monster while coping with bullying and the terminal illness of his mother. He moves in with his grandmother as his mom's condition deteriorates, and uses his imagination and friendship with the monster to escape reality. (cc).

programme.title: The Truth About Charlie
programme.desc: A loose remake of the 1963 film "Charade," this romantic thriller focuses on a mysterious American who aids a Parisian who is menaced by crooks after her husband is killed. (cc).

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: In this sequel, Batman and idealistic DA Harvey Dent join forces to arrest and prosecute Gotham City's crime lords. But the deranged Joker raises the stakes by declaring all-out war on the forces of law and order. (cc).

programme.title: State of Play
programme.desc: Adaptation of the British miniseries concerning suspicious events that set a rising congressman and a dogged reporter on a dangerous collision course. A U.S. congressman Stephen Collins is ascending the ladder of power, but his bid for the presidency hits the skids after his research assistant/mistress is viciously murdered. Now top reporter Cal McAffrey is eager to get the truth. But McAffrey has just walked into a major cover-up. (cc).

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: Adaptation of the graphic novel set in 1985 America, where a cadre of forced-into-retirement superheroes investigate the murder of one of their own and uncover a wide-ranging conspiracy. (cc).

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A team of mercenaries led by a former CIA operative is hired by the IRA to recover a mysterious briefcase before it's sold to Russian agents. Before long, the assignment turns into a deadly game of cat and mouse. (cc).

programme.title: Rellik
programme.desc: (cc).

programme.title: Death Warrant
programme.desc: A decorated police officer goes undercover in a violent prison to investigate a number of murders behind bars. No one suspects a thing until one of the officer's former prisoners is transferred to the same prison. (cc).

programme.title: Wrong Turn 4 Bloody Beginnings
programme.desc: Tenika Davis stars in this horror prequel about a group of college students who stumble upon an abandoned sanatorium and are hunted by the facility's former patients. (cc).

programme.title: Amelia
programme.desc: This biopic spans the life of aviator extraordinaire Amelia Earhart (Hilary Swank), whose famous voyage across the Atlantic was tragically overshadowed by her mysterious disappearance five years later. Richard Gere, Ewan McGregor. (cc).

programme.title: Rushmore

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: A drug shipment is sent to the wrong address, prompting a frantic race to recover the package before its contents are discovered. Brody (Mike Epps) and Guch (Wood Harris) have mistakenly received a package containing 10 kilos of cocaine. If they can just find a buyer, they'll be rich. Meanwhile, intended recipients Jesus and Chita attempt to track down the shipment before drug lord Bodego Diablo realizes it's missing. But Bodega already knows the score and he wants his drugs back. (cc).

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton stars as Davy Crockett and Dennis Quaid is Sam Houston in this somber re-creation of the famous 1836 siege in San Antonio. Historically accurate, but unexciting. Jason Patric, Patrick Wilson. Directed by John Lee Hancock (“The Rookie”). (cc).

programme.title: My Little Eye
programme.desc: In this British thriller, five contestants on a reality show spend six months together in an isolated house. They begin to turn on each other after the arrival of a stranger and a gun loaded with five bullets. (cc).

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: A scientist discovers a catastrophic problem with Earth's core, and he and a team of experts embark on a dangerous mission to the middle of the planet in the hopes of averting a global disaster. (cc).

programme.title: Blood Work
programme.desc: After his heart transplant, a retired FBI profiler tries to solve the organ donor's murder. (cc).

programme.title: Cape Fear

programme.title: Annabelle Creation

programme.title: Polska noc
programme.desc: Dla tych, którzy twierdzą, że w telewizjach muzycznych i radiach pojawia się za mało polskiej muzyki, Eska TV proponuje program "Polska noc". To całonocne pasmo zarezerwowane jest dla krajowych wykonawców.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Weekend z Eską TV
programme.desc: Autorzy programu zabierają widzów do najciekawszych miejsc w Polsce. Przeprowadzają wywiady, pokazują kulisy swojej pracy, relacjonują wydarzenia, którym towarzyszyły kamery Eski TV.

programme.title: 10 hitów 1 po 2

programme.title: Jazdy Gwiazdy
programme.desc: Gospodarz programu Filip "Rudy" Rudanacja zaprasza do swojego garbusa znane i lubiane gwiazdy show-biznesu. Podczas wspólnej przejażdżki nie zawaha się zapytać swojego gościa o wszystko, na co ma ochotę i co chcieliby usłyszeć widzowie.

programme.title: Miejska lista
programme.desc: Prowadząca program, Ola, odwiedza polskie miasta i zachęca ludzi, by wybierali klipy, które chcieliby usłyszeć.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

The fisherman wakes to discover a long, long, long fish at the end of his line. The Twirlywoo Screen draws a small line that Chickedy and Chick help make longer. Toodloo helps the line get a little longer still but when Great BigHoo taps the screen, the line becomes so long it shoots off the Twirlywoo Screen. programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos are beside a river. They watch a fisherman make his rod longer and longer and longer. The fisherman casts out the line and then settles down for a nap. Chickedy and Chick run along the rod to the very end. Toodloo runs along the rod and jumps to join Chickedy and Chick. This causes the rod to spring up sending them flying! The fisherman wakes to discover a long, long, long fish at the end of his line. The Twirlywoo Screen draws a small line that Chickedy and Chick help make longer. Toodloo helps the line get a little longer still but when Great BigHoo taps the screen, the line becomes so long it shoots off the Twirlywoo Screen. The line gets longer and longer and goes into the Big Red Boat - right into Peekaboo's house! The Twirlywoos run after the Twirly Rings whilst Peekaboo reels in the long line.(n)
